fields.title: Welcome to Whole Life Journey
fields.summary: Get started with your personal life operating system for reflection, growth, and intentional living.
fields.content:
Whole Life Journey is your personal space for reflection, growth, and faithful living. Here's what you can do:

## Core Features

- **Dashboard**: Your daily hub showing insights, celebrations, and what needs attention
- **Journal**: Record your thoughts, moods, and reflections
- **Health**: Track weight, fitness, heart rate, and more
- **Faith**: Manage prayers, scripture, and spiritual milestones
- **Life**: Organize projects, tasks, documents, and recipes
- **Purpose**: Set goals and track your progress

## Getting Started

1. Visit your Dashboard to see today's insights
2. Write your first journal entry
3. Customize your preferences in Settings
4. Enable or disable modules based on your needs
fields.keywords: getting started, welcome, introduction, overview, features, basics

fields.title: Using the Dashboard
fields.summary: Your Dashboard is the central hub showing daily insights, celebrations, and important updates.
fields.content:
The Dashboard is your home base in Whole Life Journey. Here's what you'll find:

## Today's Insight

An AI-generated insight based on your recent activities and entries. This is personalized to your coaching style preference.

## Celebrations

Recognition of your achievements, streaks, and milestones. We believe in celebrating progress!

## Accountability Nudges

Gentle reminders about goals and habits that need attention.

## Quick Actions

Fast access to common tasks like creating a journal entry or logging health data.

## Tips

- Check your dashboard daily for fresh insights
- The insights adapt to your selected coaching style
- Click on any card to dive deeper into that area
fields.keywords: dashboard, home, insights, celebrations, daily, overview, ai

fields.title: Writing Journal Entries
fields.summary: Learn how to create, edit, and organize your journal entries for meaningful reflection.
fields.content:
The Journal module helps you capture your thoughts, track your mood, and reflect on your experiences.

## Creating an Entry

1. Click 'New Entry' from the Journal page
2. Add a title (optional) and your content
3. Select your current mood
4. Add tags to organize your entries
5. Use speech-to-text if you prefer talking

## Features

- **Mood Tracking**: Select how you're feeling with each entry
- **Tags**: Organize entries by topic, project, or theme
- **Speech-to-Text**: Dictate your entries using voice
- **AI Reflections**: Get insights on your entries (if AI is enabled)

## Tips

- Write regularly, even if just a few sentences
- Use tags consistently to find entries later
- Review past entries to see your growth
fields.keywords: journal, entries, writing, mood, tags, reflection, speech, dictation

fields.title: Health Tracking
fields.summary: Track your weight, fitness activities, heart rate, and other health metrics.
fields.content:
The Health module helps you monitor and improve your physical wellness.

## Available Trackers

- **Weight**: Log your weight and see trends over time
- **Fitness**: Record workouts and activities
- **Heart Rate**: Track resting and active heart rate
- **Glucose**: Monitor blood sugar levels
- **Fasting**: Track intermittent fasting windows

## Logging Data

1. Navigate to Health
2. Select the metric you want to log
3. Enter your data and save

## Viewing Trends

Each tracker shows your historical data with charts and statistics to help you understand your progress.

## Tips

- Log consistently at the same time each day
- Use the notes field for context (how you felt, what you ate, etc.)
- Check weekly and monthly trends to see patterns
fields.keywords: health, weight, fitness, workout, exercise, heart rate, glucose, fasting, tracking

fields.title: Faith Module
fields.summary: Manage your prayer life, scripture study, and spiritual milestones.
fields.content:
The Faith module supports your spiritual journey with tools for prayer, scripture, and milestone tracking.

## Features

- **Prayer List**: Track prayer requests and mark them as answered
- **Scripture**: Save meaningful verses and passages
- **Milestones**: Record important spiritual moments

## Managing Prayers

1. Add prayers with a description and optional category
2. Mark prayers as 'answered' when God responds
3. Archive prayers you no longer need to see daily

## Scripture Tracking

Save verses that speak to you, add notes, and organize by topic.

## Enabling/Disabling

The Faith module can be enabled or disabled in Preferences. If you don't use this feature, simply turn it off to simplify your experience.
fields.keywords: faith, prayer, prayers, scripture, bible, spiritual, christian, milestones

fields.title: Customizing Your Preferences
fields.summary: Personalize Whole Life Journey with themes, modules, AI coaching styles, and more.
fields.content:
Preferences let you customize how the app looks and works for you.

## Theme & Appearance

- Choose from multiple color themes
- Select a custom accent color
- Themes work in both light and dark mode

## Module Toggles

Enable or disable features you don't need:
- Faith Module
- AI Features
- And more

## AI Coaching Style

If AI is enabled, choose how the AI communicates with you:
- Supportive Partner
- Direct Coach
- Gentle Guide
- Wise Mentor
- Cheerful Friend
- Calm Companion
- Accountability Partner

## Location & Timezone

Set your location and timezone for accurate scheduling and weather.

## Accessing Preferences

Click your profile icon in the navigation, then select 'Preferences'.
fields.keywords: preferences, settings, theme, color, modules, ai, coaching style, customize

fields.title: AI Coaching Styles Explained
fields.summary: Understand the different AI coaching personalities and choose the one that fits you best.
fields.content:
The AI coach adapts its communication style based on your preference. Here are the available styles:

## Supportive Partner

Warm and encouraging. Celebrates your wins and provides gentle guidance when you struggle.

## Direct Coach

Brief and action-oriented. Gets straight to the point with clear instructions.

## Gentle Guide

Patient and nurturing. Takes time to explain things and never rushes you.

## Wise Mentor

Thoughtful and reflective. Offers wisdom and encourages deeper thinking.

## Cheerful Friend

Upbeat and energetic. Keeps things fun and positive.

## Calm Companion

Steady and peaceful. Provides a grounding presence without adding pressure.

## Accountability Partner

Motivating and focused. Helps you stay on track with your goals.

## Changing Your Style

Go to Preferences, scroll to AI Settings, and select your preferred style.
fields.keywords: ai, coaching, style, personality, supportive, direct, gentle, mentor, cheerful, calm, accountability

fields.title: Why Can't I See Certain Features?
fields.summary: Some features may be disabled in your preferences or require specific settings.
fields.content:
If you can't find a feature, here are some things to check:

## Module Toggles

Features like Faith and AI are optional and can be disabled. Check Preferences to enable them.

## AI Features

AI-powered insights require:
1. AI to be enabled in Preferences
2. A valid OpenAI API key (for self-hosted instances)

## Faith Module

The Faith module (prayers, scripture, milestones) is optional. Enable it in Preferences if you'd like to use it.

## Navigation

Some features are accessed through sub-menus or the Life module dropdown.

## Still Can't Find It?

Use the chat button to ask the WLJ Assistant for help locating specific features.
fields.keywords: missing, hidden, can't find, not showing, disabled, feature, enable
